players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "This is terrible, Charlie's gone. We have to be careful and discuss who might be the mafioso among us."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to protect the town."
Diana: "I agree with my earlier statement—Bob is the mafioso. Let's unite and vote him out to end this."
Bob: "Diana, you're just trying to frame me with false claims. I think you're the real mafioso—let's vote you out instead!"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
